title: Rogue Science Ad-Lib Special Vol I
description:
Publisher- Psionic Comics

Title-  Rogue Science: Ad-Lib Special Vol. I

Genre-  Sci-Fi Comedy (fill-in the blanks)

Pages- (27 pgs. total) Cover, Inside Info, 25pgs.(2 short stories, 2 ads)


Description:

A team of rogue scientists discover ways to cross through the limits of the multi-verse.  These are their adventures.

This book is comprised of two short story-archs of the Rogue Science Team.  It's a 'fill-in the blanks' book designed to give some interactive creative process to the readers.  It was originally intended to be available in an app, but that fell through. This is the alternative...

So... Here we are... We also have the 'Rogue Science #0' issue available as a torrent... You can find that around here somewhere... Psionic Comics has a lot of plans for 'Rogue Science', including game demos... If you're a platform designer... Feel free to contact us if you'd want to collaborate... There'll also eventually be animated shorts available... But we don't know how that will be distributed yet... These are presents from the Psionic Team... Please enjoy...

versethesystemstudios.com...
